definitions.definition: An expression of intent to injure or punish another.
An indication of potential or imminent danger .
examples: Verifying and addressing actual threats is not paranoia.

definitions.definition: A person or object that is regarded as a danger; a menace .

main_definition: An expression of intent to injure or punish another.
secondary_definitions: An indication of potential or imminent danger .
A person or object that is regarded as a danger; a menace .
